tooltip.soulspirit.soul_fragment.tooltip: §5A strange Fragment gained through the death of a player by your hands
tooltip.soulspirit.soul_shard.tooltip: §5A glowing Shard which pulses with life energy
tooltip.soulspirit.soul_totem.tooltip: §5Using the Shards life energy, you can revive a fallen Person
tooltip.soulspirit.soul_elixir.tooltip: §5A weaker version of the Soul totem that restores 1 life of yourself
tooltip.soulspirit.soul_catalyst.tooltip: §5§kkhj§5A powerful Artifact amplified with negative energy§kkhj
